meanings.definition: The state or quality of being superintense.
meanings.sent1: The superintensities of the situation made everyone nervous.
meanings.sent2: The superintensities of the heatwave were unbearable.
meanings.sent3: The superintensities of the toddler's tantrum were both amusing and exhausting.
meanings.sent4: The superintensities of the storm shook the entire town.
meanings.sent5: The superintensities of the fireworks display lit up the night sky.

meanings.definition: A high degree of intensity or strength.
meanings.sent1: The superintensities of the workout left me feeling exhausted.
meanings.sent2: The superintensities of the competition were evident in every athlete's performance.
meanings.sent3: The superintensities of the teacher's glare made the students sit up straight.
meanings.sent4: The superintensities of the emotions in the room could be felt by everyone.
meanings.sent5: The superintensities of the music moved the audience to tears.

meanings.definition: The act or process of supervising or overseeing with great intensity.
meanings.sent1: The superintensities of the manager's supervision kept everyone on their toes.
meanings.sent2: The superintensities of the investigation led to a quick resolution.
meanings.sent3: The superintensities of the security guard's watchful eye made the visitors feel safe.
meanings.sent4: The superintensities of the coach's training regimen pushed the team to their limits.
meanings.sent5: The superintensities of the surveillance cameras ensured the building's safety.
